guidelines: Includes skip-link functionality for keyboard navigation
Use proper heading hierarchy for navigation titles
Ensure sufficient color contrast for all theme variations
Test keyboard navigation through expandable menu items
Provide clear visual indicators for active trail items
accessibility.aria_support: Inherits ARIA attributes from included menu component with collapsible functionality

best_practices: Keep navigation hierarchy to reasonable depth (max 3 levels recommended)
Use descriptive titles that clearly indicate page content
Consider using active trail to show current page context
Test collapsible functionality across different screen sizes
Ensure navigation titles align with page content structure

notes: Component has stable status in source
Includes complex theming for parent/child and active states
Good example data showing multi-level hierarchy
